name: Save the sun MAN
description:
The sun is getting cold.

It needs batteries to recharge.
You've gotta collect batteries to save the sun MAN!

ARROW KEY MOVEMENT

STORY:
Save the sun MAN follows the character of MAN a no armed abundantly tinge two-legged creature.  MAN must save the sun which is getting colder by supplying the sun with batteries that are fueled to the sun via "The fountain of SUN".  The two main sections consist of the "Mushroom and Duck EUTOPIA" and "The ancient rock TEMPLE".

Art and vocals by Piggles
Programming and Music by Chippy
